extendedInfo.description: ALPHA is your personal voice assistant.ALPHA can research data and facts and execute commands â it knows what you want and talks with you!Advantages of Pro version: http://goo.gl/hQuHMiPay with PayPal or paysafecard: http://goo.gl/eeIDgtYou can talk with ALPHA about the weather, call contacts and much more.Say for example âHow is the weather today in Cologne?â and ALPHA will show you the relevant weather data for Cologne.Simply ask ALPHA for anything that interests you:â¢ How far is it from Cologne to Berlin?â¢ How many people live in Germany?â¢ What is Google?â¢ Who is Barack Obama?â¢ How old is he?â¢ Who is his wife?â¢ When was Michael Jackson born?â¢ When he died?â¢ Where is the Eiffel Tower?â¢ How many states does the US have?â¢ How old is Rihanna?â¢ Who is her boyfriend?â¢ Who is the prime minister of Turkey?â¢ Show me a picture of the Eiffel Tower.â¢ How will be the weather like in Paris?â¢ Howâs the weather? (automatic position detection)â¢ Post to Facebook "Good morning, world!"â¢ What is the capital of Turkey?â¢ Elevation of New York?â¢ How long is River Thames?â¢ How big is London?â¢ How tall is Lionel Messi?â¢ Which nationality has Obama?â¢ Where am I? (automatic position detection)â¢ What means hello in Japanese?â¢ Calculate 3 times 8 minus root of tangent of 3.â¢ What is 2 times pi?â¢ What is my horoscope?â¢ Show me my calendar.â¢ Do I have an appointment on Friday?â¢ Events from the next day after tomorrow.â¢ Do I have appointments from Tuesday till Friday 14 oâclock?â¢ Write an SMS to John Doe.â¢ Create a new event.â¢ Remind me tomorrow at 5 oâclock to the meeting with Peter.â¢ Who was the leading actor of the movie Avatar?â¢ Who directed in Avatar?â¢ How long takes the film Avatar?â¢ My name is Peter.â¢ My zodiac sign is Aries.â¢ Call my wife.â¢ Go to Facebook.â¢ Search for Wikipedia antimatter.â¢ Open TheTimes.co.uk.â¢ Wake me up at 6 oâclock.â¢ Write an e-mail.â¢ Navigate to London.â¢ Search for restaurants near to me.â¢ Are there cafÃ©s here?â¢ Navigate to the nearest doctor.â¢ Search for a shop in Hamburg.â¢ Switch the light on.â¢ Light off.â¢ Set the timer to 3 minutes and 10 seconds.â¢ Timer at 20 oâclock.â¢ Turn Bluetooth on.â¢ WLAN off.â¢ Be quiet! (Mute)â¢ Sounds off.â¦ and much more!Of course these are only examples â ALPHA understands you too, if you speak colloquially. We use the Intelligent Recognition Resamplerâ¢ method, which is analyzing your speech several times with the help of a huge database â which is growing every day â and providing the best results.That means: Up to 60% better voice recognition!And the best of all: ALPHA improves daily, with your help!Requirements:â¢ Google VoicesearchSupported languages:â¢ English and GermanThe online TTS is powered by iSpeechÂ®.ââââââââââââââââââââThe alarm does not work?Probably your device does not support this function; an additional alarm app (e. g. Circle Alarm) may be required.For PayPal buyers: http://goo.gl/t39HsChangelog: http://goo.gl/XPmPpGoogle+: http://goo.gl/HvAw2Facebook: http://goo.gl/J3nSLTerms & Conditions: http://goo.gl/z4wyn(With the purchase of ALPHA you accept the terms and conditions.)Tags: Voice control, Alice, AIVC, Alicoid, Agent, Iris, Risi, Cluzee, S Voice, Eva, Omega, Siri, Apple, iPhone, iPad, Majel

reviews.comment: I keep having error messages how can you fix it

reviews.title: average
reviews.comment: alpha is OK but it needs more work done everytime I ask it for commands it misspells it it also as told me know on some things like I asked can you find out how old is President Barack Obama is it said No other than that alpha is a good workin voice command application I would recommend it to some people lot a lot like I would with Alice.
reviews.author: Audrey Lenhart

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.comment: This app can\'t even do simple commands and every time I ask it something it tells me it doesn\'t understand, this app needs a complete redo!
reviews.author: Cruz Bolanos

reviews.comment: Pretty good app... But doesn\'t recognize simple commands like \"What Time is it?\" or \"What\'s on my agenda for Today?\"
reviews.author: Tom Chan

reviews.title: pretty good
reviews.comment: but i have a suggestion u can make him/her open a game saying open (the games name) i tried it it just says what do u mean

reviews.title: Mike mike
reviews.comment: Fast pace and on the go I finally found something that can keep up and best of all web for alpha is a breeze

reviews.title: Awesome, but...
reviews.comment: Really good, but not there! Add offline ussage, that would be great!

reviews.comment: I love your response time to issues. Alpha is not opening apps for me. It understands what I am saying but does not do it. Help:-)  infuse  everything else ok so far

reviews.comment: Simply the best! Keep Improving your doing a great job, a true Siri competitor thanks!
reviews.author: susy garcia

reviews.title: Incredible!
reviews.comment: Absolutely love it very smooth very nice
reviews.author: jeremiah valpatic

reviews.title: Very Well Designed
reviews.comment: Sure there\'s room for improvements, but I\'ve never seen a more dedicated developer who responds to requests and make frequent updates. This is a must have App, can\'t wait for the next batch of improvements.
reviews.author: Trevor Hansen

reviews.title: Gut...
reviews.comment: Aber k\303\266nntest du eventuell.noch einbauen, dass der akkustand angezeigt werden kann? W\303\244re aufjedenfall geil! :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Out of all the voice assistant apps I have used this is definitely the best! The only suggestion I have is some sort of integration with Wolfram Alpha. They always seem to have an answer to everything, and I think they have an api.
reviews.author: Joshua Towner

reviews.title: Amazing app!
reviews.comment: The best Voice Assistant Award goes to ALPHA by Dragonwork! I have tried many other Voice Assistants, but ALPHA seriously is the best of all. UI is clean and minimal, I love it! But just 1 bug: sometimes when I say something, it will end the listening part after I finish talking and ALPHA won\'t answer. Takes me around 2-3 times to say the same thing until ALPHA gives an answer. I can live with this bug, but its better to remove the bug. Thank you so much Dragonwork!
reviews.author: Ammar Basalamah

reviews.title: It\'s a love hate thing ; )
reviews.comment: The good: the UI is clean, clear & so easy to understand. I\'m not s fan of having an avatar on my UI so this is just perfect. The recognition is pretty accurate. Names are 85% correct. The bad: it\'s glitchy. It will randomly allert me that there is no internet connection & require me to restart the app. It seems to stutter which I\'m not sure if this is part of the same problem. If I ask for the time, it gets militant about setting a timer. Won\'t read incoming messages. I am looking forward to new updates!
reviews.author: Shayn Yoe

reviews.title: Needs improvements
reviews.comment: It\'s a cool idea to be able to control certain apps like wifi and bluetooth but the voice recognition never does what I tell i lt to, for example I say set the alarm to 8:00 am tomorrow and it ends up setting it to 00:00 every time.  I\'m gonna keep the app but unless emprovements are made I\'m afraid it\'ll be on my sh!t list.
reviews.author: Bassam Najem

reviews.title: One request
reviews.comment: Really like the app but I\'m trying to learn Celsius. On Google now I have it set to default Celsius and if I need the weather in Fahrenheit I can say \"what is the weather in Fahrenheit?\"And it gives me the weather in Fahrenheit. Also if I say \"what is the low tonight\" the app says \"I do not understand.\"\302\240
reviews.author: Ethan Pierson
